snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon named members of the Ferguson Commission to address the unrest after the shooting of an unarmed black teenager by a white police officer.
abstract: Gov. Jay Nixon named members of the Ferguson Commission to address the unrest after the shooting of an unarmed black teenager by a white police officer.

byline.original: By MITCH SMITH and JULIE BOSMAN

headline.main: Missouri Governor Announces Members of Ferguson Commission
